meanings.definition: A stationary bicycle used for exercise.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy using exercycles at the gym to stay fit.
meanings.sent2: The exercycles in the fitness center are always in high demand.
meanings.sent3: The exercycles at the gym seem to whisper, 'Time to work out!'
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the exercycles turned her into a fitness enthusiast.
meanings.sent5: The exercycles hum with the sound of determination and sweat.

meanings.definition: To use a stationary bicycle for physical activity.
meanings.sent1: She exercycles every morning to boost her energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Exercycling is a great way to improve cardiovascular health.
meanings.sent3: He exercycles so fast that it looks like he's racing in one spot!
meanings.sent4: Exercycling through life's challenges helps him stay strong.
meanings.sent5: Exercycling up the hill, she felt the burn in her muscles.
